amendment.description: To implement President Obama's earmark reforms.

action.text: Amendment SA 967 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 967 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 69. Record Vote Number: 149.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 967.
Amendment SA 967 proposed by Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR S4283-4284; text: CR S4283) To implement President Obama's earmark reforms.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 967 proposed by Senator DeMint.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 967 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 69. Record Vote Number: 149.
